# About the Author {-}

[Aravind Hebbali](https://www.aravindhebbali.com) is the founder of 
[Rsquared Academy](https://www.rsquaredacademy.com). He earned his Masters in 
Economics from [Madras School of Economics](https://www.mse.ac.in). As an 
active R user, he has authored several R packages such as 

- [olsrr](https://olsrr.rsquaredacademy.com)
- [rfm](https://rfm.rsquaredacademy.com)
- [descriptr](https://descriptr.rsquaredacademy.com)
- [blorr](https://blorr.rsquaredacademy.com)
- [xplorerr](https://xplorerr.rsquaredacademy.com)

In 2015, he founded [Rsquared Academy](https://www.rsquaredacademy.com), a 
free and open source education initiative with focus on data science and 
analytics. Apart from self paced online courses, Rsquared Academy offers 
customized learning modules for corporates and universities. 

You can find him on [GitHub](https://github.com/aravindhebbali).
